# validationMetrics

**Instance Property**

Measurements of the action classifier’s performance on the validation dataset.

## Declaration

```swift
var validationMetrics: MLClassifierMetrics { get }
```

## Evaluating an action classifier

- **evaluation(on:)**: Generates metrics describing the action classifier’s performance on labeled videos represented by a data source.
- **trainingMetrics**: Measurements of the action classifier’s performance on the training dataset.
